name: io.github.drtrips-comp.drtrips-google-mcp
description: MCP server for Google Places API with geocoding, place search, and place details functionality

tools.name: geocode_address
tools.description: Convert an address to geographic coordinates using Google Geocoding API

tools.name: get_place_details
tools.description: Get detailed information about a place using Google Places API (by place ID or search query)

required.name: GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY
required.description: Google Maps API key with Places API and Geocoding API enabled
